channel.title: PVT servers in LAN
channel.description:
Hello all.. :D
I want to go bigger today, I want to know if it is possible to make a Private server work in a LAN (Local Area Network) which means the server will not be open to the internet only for a local network...I believe this can be made but not easily ("Impossible" isn't in my dictionary, ;)) if you think you can help post, If i see properly I will give you more info to stay in contact :cool:
I work with networking 24/7 so you don't need to break your head with net i will take care of it...just need help with the code ;)

item.title: PVT servers in LAN
